titleStmt.title: Description of A marriage contract (ketubah) and two divorce contracts (get).

notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A marriage contract (ketubah) and two divorce contracts (get).

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Persian square and semi-cursive script of the 18th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Tracts. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Or. Ms. 2458. A-C.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Adolph Neubauer: purchased from him by the British Museum on 24 June 1882: inscribed, folio [ii recto] (fs002r).
